ComicInfo.Summary:
Caught in a Web: Sam Spider takes over the shoe-house Mighty Mouse gave to the elves.
A Day in June: Dimwit tries an unusual rainmaking method that is plenty painful to Farmer Gray.
Mousing Problem: Percy Puss uses a blow-gun to propel Little Roquefort back into his mousehole, but Roquefort retaliates.
The Fatal Cream Puff: Oil Can Harry finally discovers Mighty Mouse's weakness... "He's allergic to cream puffs and can't stand being hit in the face with one"! And, for good measure, Harry sends an impossibly large number of professional wrestlers after our hero.
The Model Cat: Percy Puss is to be honored by the mayor as "the model cat of the community", but not if Little Roquefort has anything to say about it.
A Sleepless Night: Tucked in their bed for the night, the Terry Bears are scared as a storm rages outside. They turn to their "fearless" Papa for courage.
The Last Straw: Try as he might, Sourpuss cannot get a moment's quiet from Gandy.
Mail Robbery: The Claw's gang is stealing the Terrytown mail, leading him to a high-society costume party, with lots of jewels on display. The Claw robs the jewels and takes Mitzi as a hostage. Captive Mitzi devises a clever way to signal Mighty Mouse.
ComicInfo.Tags: Gandy Goose,Oil Can Harry,Dimwit,Mighty Mouse,Mitzi Mouse,Pearl Pureheart,Sourpuss,Little Roquefort,Terry Bears,Percy Puss,Farmer Al Falfa
ComicInfo.Title: Caught in a Web; A Day in June; Mousing Problem; The Fatal Cream Puff; The Model Cat; A Sleepless Night; The Last Straw; Mail Robbery
